definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: In what the Club views as a severe over-reaction, local police handed out indiscriminate beatings to United supporters.
sentences.chinese: 俱乐部认为当地警方执法过当并殴打了曼联球迷。

sentences.english: Palestinian legislator Mustafa Barghouti says it was excessive use of force.
sentences.chinese: 巴勒斯坦议员巴尔古提认为以色列军队使用武力过当。

sentences.english: Be protective, but not to the point of being overprotective.
sentences.chinese: 要有保护欲，但不能保护过当。

sentences.english: I have witnessed "flails" triggered by panic with the situation going from bad to worse.
sentences.chinese: 我经历过当情况变得越来越糟时所触发的连环恐慌。

definition: frank/outspoken/ready/settled/in order/(old) to deal with/to handle
to become aware/to detect/to realize/to perceive
to believe (sth in relation to oneself)/to regard oneself as/to acknowledge (sth in relation to oneself)/to resign oneself to
to ask oneself/to search one's soul/to reach a conclusion after weighing a matter
many times/on more than one occasion
taken in (by sb's deceit)/to be fooled/to be duped
to witness/to see at first hand/to see with one's own eyes
erhua variant of 壓根|压根[ya4 gen1]
